name: Jennifer Bonsey
text: They were very knowledgeable and very helpful.  I have an upcoming total hip replacement surgery. I was so happy with my purchase.  You've helped me so much!!

name: Stacy G.
text: First time going there and they told me the deals and was quick and awesome. I didn't have to ask what the deals were and they didn't try and sell me the most expensive stuff, they asked a few questions and they knew what I would like, and they were spot on. Thanks guys!

name: Amanda Guyette
text: Great staff, they take the time to explain what each product is. They don't make you feel like you can't ask what you're purchasing. Not everyone is up on what every new product is and I feel some places don't do as good as a job explaining what it is for or how it's used. Triple C does and it helps when trying to find the right product for you.
